tier.description: Speak with The Stationmaster in Agartha. (Click and target him to start a conversation.) You can abort this mission at any time by clicking on the X above.
Listen to The Stationmaster. (You should see dialog in subtitles.)

dialog.line: Good day, sir.
Good day, madame.
Ah... another seeking to take a peek into what lies under the surface, I gather.
There are stories yet to be told... grand adventures yet to be had.
Unsanctioned adventures, mind you. Stories not bound by canon or decree.
Welcome, then. Welcome, indeed.
My colleagues and I will endeavor to give you a proper tour of the mission system.
As such, we will be 'breaking the fourth wall' as it were.
However, this is not indicative of future missions.
We seek only the highest quality and entertainment.
Perhaps you will play a part in that... but first we must provide you with an education.
Let's get started, shall we? Punctuality is key.
As you are no doubt aware, a mission is made up of multiple tiers.
Tiers in this system are small affairs.
You already completed a tier when you targeted me.
You are in the middle of a dialog tier right now.
Other types of tiers are available as well, and perhaps even more will be added over time.
I won't keep you with all the details, but suffice it to say there is much you can do.
That is all for your first lesson.
A Mr. Boone now awaits you. Down the path, first portal on the left. You can't miss it.

tier.description: Go see Jack Boone in Kingsmouth.
Listen as Jack Boone talks about the dialog system.

dialog.line: {{m_Player.m_Name}}... How's the {{m_Player.m_Faction}} treatin' ya, brother?
{{m_Player.m_Name}}... How's the {{m_Player.m_Faction}} treatin' ya, darlin'?
I reckon you don't feel so 'secret' after a line like that.
Don't fret, I won't overdo it.
That wouldn't be in keepin' with expectations.
You ought to know what the system is capable of, that's all.
We're here to talk about dialog.
As you can see, we communicate through subtitles.
No fancy voice acting or motion capture here,
just the full power of the written word.
Cinematic cameras are available for those inclined to put in the effort.
There are other tricks of the trade...
You need a pause in the conversation, you just fade out for a bit...
... then fade back in...
... and continue your dialog.
If I'm talkin' too slow or too fast for ya, you just let us know.
We aim to please.
That's my piece. Nice talkin' to ya, but there's more to life than conversation, brother.
That's my piece. Nice talkin' to ya, but there's more to life than conversation, darlin'.
Head on down the road to see Sheriff Bannerman. She'll learn you a thing or two.

tier.description: Go talk to the Sheriff.
Talk to the Sheriff about combat.

dialog.line: You've got some dangerous lookin' weapons there.
Good. You're gonna need 'em.
There's a time to talk to your friends, and a time to put down your enemies.
The system works how you'd expect.
Pick your enemies, how many ya want to kill, then get to work.
It's that simple.
The church is your next stop. Take out some zombies on your way. Lord knows we have plenty.

tier.description: Take out some zombies. (The counter should increment as you kill zombies in the area.)
Go to the church.
Talk to Henry Hawthorne.
Henry Hawthorne will teach you about the Location tier.

dialog.line: Great blessings upon you, my child.
You have come to the right place.
Indeed, you may have noticed that your mission advanced as soon as you walked into the church.
The Location tier makes this easy.
Arrive within range of the specified coordinates, and the mission tier will complete.
I'm sure there are a great many uses for this technology, including Investigation missions.
Ah, but for those, you will need additional technical support,
and I'm afraid you won't find much of that around here.
You must journey to Seoul to find the enlightenment you seek. Safe travels, my child.

tier.description: Travel to Seoul.
Go to the Blackhole PC bang.
Talk to the administrative worker.
Learn about the web browser capabilities.

dialog.line: Biyong-eun seonbullo sigandang cheon-won ibnida ...
Oh, you {{m_Player.m_Name}}, right? Please excuse.
You here for technical support then. Very good.
You want make Investigation mission, then web browser your best friend.
Of course, player still use browser on their own for research, but you also use to display web site.
I will demonstrate...

tier.description: You can display a site of your choosing using the web browser. The title bar caption is customizable. (Close the browser to continue.)
Learn about the web browser capabilities.

dialog.line: You also use browser to show picture, like so...

tier.description: Notice that the browser has been resized and the URL has been hidden. (Close the browser to continue.)
tier.browserTitle: KOREAN GIRLS They all want to marry me!

tier.description: Learn about the web browser capabilities.

dialog.line: Web browser also great for YouTube HTML5 video...

tier.description: YouTube HTML5 videos can be displayed in the browser. Video quality may be limited. (Close the browser to continue.)
Leave the building.

dialog.line: That pretty cool, huh?
That all I have to show you.
You get back to your game, so I get back to mine.

tier.description: Leave the building.
Sweet, Space Invaders! I guess a quick game couldn't hurt.
tier.browserTitle: INVADERS Use arrow keys to move, SPACE to fire.

tier.description: Basic training is complete. Go back to Agartha and speak with The Stationmaster.
Speak with the Stationmaster.

dialog.line: Ah, welcome back.
I hope you found your tour of the system educational.
If you would be so kind as to provide us with your feedback.
A browser page will appear for your input shortly.
Looking forward... this is just the beginning.
There are so many stories in this 'Secret World' of ours, just waiting to be told.
Where we go from here depends on the community.
Thank you for your time and attention.

tier.description: Thank your for playing! Please provide feedback in the TSW forums.
